text_en: Atul Ambekar, by National Rehabilitation Centre, Jamal Younes Anani, Sawitri Assanangkornchai, Abu Dhabi (Hamad Al Ghaferi, Linda Cottler, Hans Dharma, Ahmed El Kashef, Director-General): Tarek Abdel Gawad, Susumu Higuchi, Sang Kyu Lee, Min Zhao, Fareed Minhas, Neo Morojele, David Ndetei, Dzianis Padruchny, Marina Piazza, Afarin Rahimi-Movaghar, Hisham Ramy, Marcelo Ribeiro, Robin Room, John B.
